title: Yasuo players......... *sigh* even in mid eloish they all make me wanna blow my load

replies.body:
I will play yasuo! I will not feed! Yasuo Is My Main!

93% or whatever winrate op!
Filthy yasuo noobs. Do not place me with them
all yasuo mains are filthy yasuo mains

I think I'm going to puke

I'm not sure if it's because I heard the words play and yasuo in the same sentence, or because somewhere out there a man can blow his load off looking at a face as ugly as Yasuo
